sources.title: Melody for Three
sources.description: One of the films that featured the character Dr. Christian.

sources.title: Melody for Three (1941) DR. CHRISTIAN
sources.description:
Stars: Jean Hersholt, Fay Wray, Walter Woolf King
 Director: Erle C. Kenton

 Dr. Christian takes an interest in a young boy, a violin prodigy, whose mother is a divorced music teacher. His interest isn't just in the boy's music career--he believes it would be best for the boy to have his parents back together, and sets out to do just that.

sources.title: Melody for Three (1941) Drama Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Dr. Christian takes an interest in a young boy, a violin prodigy, whose mother is a divorced music teacher. His interest isn't just in the boy's music career.


Director: Erle C. Kenton
Writers: Walter Ferris, Lee Loeb
Stars: Jean Hersholt, Fay Wray, Walter Woolf King 
Genres: Classic, Drama, Musical
